channel.title: CVE Feed for KDDI CORPORATION -- HOME SPOT CUBE2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KDDI CORPORATION -- HOME SPOT CUBE2

item.title: CVE-2022-33948|2024-08-03T08:16:15.975Z -- kddi%20corporation -- home%20spot%20cube2
item.description: HOME SPOT CUBE2 V102 contains an OS command injection vulnerability due to improper processing of data received from DHCP server. An adjacent attacker may execute an arbitrary OS command on the product if a malicious DHCP server is placed on the WAN side of the product.
